misc.author: phil_dayvault
misc.post: Louis wrote: “Phil Dayvault had offered his own plan for keeping the Shroud safe around ten years ago but there seems to have been no response.” Still safe, isn’t it?…(; ) Seriously…thanks, Louis, for remembering…however, the actual date of submission of the proposed protocol was in 1996..
misc.title: How Safe is The Shroud of Turin?
